references.formattedCitation: Fogagnolo, Stefania, and Massimiliano Valenti. Via Severiana. Antiche strade. Rome: Istituto poligrafico e Zecca dello Stato, Libreria dello Stato, 2005.

description: The great ancient maritime port of Rome, located on the right-hand bank of the Tiber River.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Fiumicino
